overview:
Vivek Sagi serves as the Chief Technology Officer at newBrandAnalytics, Inc. where he oversees engineering, R&D, product management and SaaS operations for nBA’s industry leading social business intelligence platform.

Prior to newBrandAnalytics, Vivek was general manager and vice president of ServiceLive (a Sears Holdings subsidiary) where he hired and grew the product, user interface and engineering teams to scale their marketplace platform to $150M in annual transactions.

A serial entrepreneur, Vivek previously co-founded GlobalRoads, an open source enterprise sales automation software company and ‘Jamkai’, an Apple staff pick social networking platform for the iPhone. He held multiple executive roles at Selectica where he participated in their successful IPO and led professional services and technology solutions for their strategic accounts.

Vivek holds bachelor’s and master’s degrees in engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology, Madras and Penn State. He also received an MBA with honors from the Wharton Business School.
